name: blog/gravity-start-webinar
content:
blocks:
  - type: blog-header-block
    resetPaddings: true
    paddingBottom: l
    width: m
    verticalOffset: m
    theme: dark
    background:
      image:
        src: >-
          https://storage.yandexcloud.net/gravity-landing-static/blog/blog-cover-bg.png
        disableCompress: true
      color: '#CCDAFF'
      fullWidth: false
  - type: blog-layout-block
    resetPaddings: true
    mobileOrder: reverse
    children:
      - type: blog-yfm-block
        column: left
        resetPaddings: true
        text: >
          블라디미르 티모페예프(gravity-ui.com의 Product Owner)가 Gravity UI를
          처음 접할 때 어디서부터 시작하면 되는지 소개하고, 주요 요소들을
          보여준 뒤, 이를 바탕으로 완성된 인터페이스를 구성해 보겠습니다.
      - type: blog-media-block
        column: left
        resetPaddings: true
        youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e77kbTjqZX8
        previewImg: >-
          https://storage.yandexcloud.net/gravity-landing-static/assets/zastavka-2.png
        fullWidth: false
author: timofeyevvv
